CameraRotateLeftButtonBehaviour.summary: The class that handles the behaviour of the button that rotates the camera leftwards.

DEGREES_PER_SECOND.summary: The number of degrees the camera rotates per second whlie the button is pressed.

mainScriptObject.summary: The GameObject that stores the central data for the running of the program.

camRotationCenter.summary: The GameObject about which the camera rotates.

OnPointerDown.summary: Called when a user begins to press the button.
OnPointerDown.param: The data concerning the pointer down event.

OnPointerUp.summary: Called when a user stops pressing the button.
OnPointerUp.param: The data concerning the pointer up event.

rotating.summary: Returns a bool representing whether or not the camera is currently rotating leftwards.
rotating.returns: A bool representing whether or not the camera is currently rotating leftwards.
